name: MD Textiles
overview:
Established in the year 1990 we, “M.D. Textiles”, are engaged in manufacturing and supplying a vast array of Printed Saree, Simply Embroidered Saree, Fancy Embroidered Saree, Schiffi Embroidered Saree and Plain Dyed Fabric. Our range of products encompasses Moss Printed Saree, Weight Less Printed Saree, Georgette Printed Saree, Chiffon Printed Saree and Laser Printed Saree.

Our Team: Designers Dyers Weavers Quality controllers Warehousing & packaging experts Sales and marketing executive

Our Quality: Being a quality conscious organization, we follow stringent TQM policy to offer quality-approved range of products. The sarees we offer are designed & tailored using optimum-grade fabric that is sourced from vendors of high repute after doing an extensive market research. Latest machines are employed in the manufacturing facility following industry standards & norms. Moreover, a well-equipped quality inspecting unit is developed by us for conducting various quality checks.

Our Infrastructure: We have established a state-of-the-art infrastructure facility for executing the business process in a streamlined manner. Sprawling across a vast area, this facility is installed with latest machinery that enable us to utilize the resources in a judicious manner. Owing to the high production capacity of our facility, we have been able to meet the increasing demands of clients.

Why Us?: Product Quality Durability Experience and Knowledge Client-Centric
